characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each Foul Blightspawn carries a single unholy death's head grenade. Once per battle, a Foul Blightspawn, or another friendly DEATH GUARD CHARACTER within 3" of him, can throw an unholy death's head grenade instead of either a blight grenade or a hyper blight grenade. When they do so, change that weapon's type to Grenade 2D6.
